name: Wolf vs Dragon 74
description:
Wolf vs Dragon 74 is a single player game for casual gamers.

Your task: Turn all the coins to only have wolf paws to finish each level. There are 109 levels of distinct difficulty, size or numbers of clicks to finish.

The problem: Not the clicked element will be turned but the surrounding ones. Eight in the middle, five on a border, three in a corner.

Have fun!
